description:
Who are we? Amaris Consultingis an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7,500 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.

Here's What Our Recruitment Process Looks Like

At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible.

Brief Call: Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!

Interviews(the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!

Case study: Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.

As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.

We look forward to meeting you! Job description

Entra a far parte del network di talenti di Amaris Consulting come Quality Control Analystnel settore Farmaceuticoa Latina!

👉 Cosa farai?

Eseguire test analitici utilizzando gli strumenti di laboratorio (HPLC/UPLC, UV-Vis, IR, titolazione, cromatografia su strato sottile, ecc.) su prodotto finito per il rilascio;
Verificare la conformità dei prodotti farmaceutici alle specifiche di qualità e alle GMP;
Documentare accuratamente i risultati delle analisi e i dati di laboratorio in conformità con i requisiti regolamentari;
Identificare e risolvere eventuali problemi tecnici o di qualità, collaborando con i colleghi dei dipartimenti di produzione e controllo qualità;
Mantenere il laboratorio pulito, organizzato e rispettare le norme di sicurezza e i protocolli di sicurezza.
✍️ Cosa Richiediamo?

Laurea in CTF, Farmacia, Chimica Analitica o similari;
Minimo 1 anno di esperienza come Analista Controllo Qualità nell'industria farmaceutica;
Conoscenza degli strumenti analitici di laboratorio (HPLC/UPLC, UV-Vis, IR, titolazione, cromatografia su strato sottile, ecc.) e di Empower per la gestione e acquisizione dei dati cromatografici;
Ottima conoscenza delle GMP e principi di Data Integrity;
Capacità di lavorare in modo indipendente, di gestire diversi progetti contemporaneamente e di rispettare le scadenze;
Eccellenti capacità di comunicazione e di collaborazione con i colleghi e con i fornitori.
✨ Che cosa offriamo?

Lavoro per obiettivi con monitoraggio trimestrale.
Percorso di crescita formativo e tecnico.
Clima di lavoro inclusivo.
Lunch vouchers di 8€ per giornata lavorativa.
Accesso gratuito alla piattaforma Mantu Academy con più di 500 corsi.
Accesso gratuito alla piattaforma Udemy con più di 200.000 corsi.
Consulenza psicologica.
🙌 Il nostro candidato ideale si riconosce in questi valori:

Pioneer Spirit: voglia di esplorare le nuove tecnologie, idee e competenze per costruire un mondo più sostenibile.
Care: impegno nella promozione della diversità, della meritocrazia e della salvaguardia dell'ambiente per un futuro migliore.
Performance: costante ambizione di raggiungere l'eccellenza attraverso la creatività, l'innovazione e la tecnologia.
Trust: la fiducia è un pilastro del progresso, che spinge alla libertà, alla creatività e all'innovazione.
Independence: l'indipendenza è la base per realizzare un futuro prospero e agile.
Amaris Consultingè un'azienda leader di settore certificata Top Employer 2023che supporta i propri partner nelle principali aree del settore farmaceutico e biomedicale nella qualità, laboratori, R&D e produzione.

Amaris Consulting è un’azienda che crede nelle pari opportunità. Ci impegniamo a promuovere ogni tipo di diversità all’interno dei nostri team e a creare un ambiente di lavoro aperto a tutti. È per questo che incoraggiamo i candidati in possesso dei requisiti richiesti a presentare la candidatura, a prescindere dal loro genere, orientazione sessuale, etnia, credo o religione, stato civile, disabilità o altre caratteristiche.

description:
ComparaJá.pt

ComparaJá.pt is a free and independent online comparison platform for financial services and products, with a clear mission: to help people saving time and money, in a quick and simple comparison tool.

Our goal is for Portuguese consumers to make informed and conscious financial decisions. For this, we provide a free, impartial, thorough and independent platform, where people can compare the various financial providers in the Portuguese market for home loans, personal loans, credit cards, telecommunication and energy providers, life insurance and saving accounts.

We are the #1 personal finance platform in Portugal for the users, our partners and media channels. We are part of Samlino Group, a European Investment Company that helps Europeans save time and money by making better choices about insurance, home services and banking products. In Europe, our sister companies are: Samlino.dk (Denmark), VertaaEnsin.fi (Finland), TopCompare.be & Tariefchecker.be (Belgium), and Pricefox.gr (Greece).

What You'll Do

Reporting to the Financial Controller, you will support:

Revenue closing;
Confirmation of unbilled revenue with partners: reconciliation of full data with partner data;
Confirmation of membership costs;
Issuance and registration of invoices;
Maintaining the register of partner contracts.

What We Expect From You

You possess an unparalleled work ethic with a high sense of urgency. You have a relentless drive and desire to be the very best at what you do. You take ownership of everything you do, are proactive and follow through on commitments. Moreover, you're humble and you share our passion for building and executing new businesses. Furthermore, we expect that you:

Have acquired a bachelor degree in Accountability, Management, Economics, Finance or another related field. Financial knowledge is a plus.
You are a fresh graduate looking for a first experience in a fast-paced working environment.
You are knowledgeable in MS Office.
You have a strong sense of ownership and initiative and a genuine interest in learning and act on the desire.
You have a strong affinity for critical thinking, analytical, hands-on execution, problem-solving, and result-orientation.
Ideally you are available to start in May 2023 and have an EU work permit.

What We Offer

A workplace with great talents and leaders that will inspire and challenge you daily.
Competitive compensation and benefits.
Assume responsibility and decision-making authority from your first day.
Work on exciting and challenging projects and create an impact with new, innovative ideas.
Grow personally and professionally from working both independently and as part of an international group.
Work with and learn from experts and mentors in diverse fields.
Create strong and meaningful connections with your team members at exciting company events.
Be part of one of the most promising Portuguese fintech startups, with one goal in mind: help the Portuguese people saving money.
linkedin_skills: Critical Thinking, Problem Solving, Budgeting, Analytical Skills, Financial Modeling, Financial Reporting, Finance, Financial Analysis, Cash Flow, and Forecasting

description:
Functieomschrijving
Sta jij aan het begin van je loopbaan, ambieer jij een carrière in de data wereld en wil je elke dag een beetje beter worden in je vak? Tijdens het traineeship van KVL word je klaargestoomd door ervaren data-experts, om je vervolgens te specialiseren als data engineer, data-analist of data steward.

Dit is wat je van het Data Heroes traineeship kunt verwachten:

Je start samen met mede-trainees met een basistraining in data & analytics;
Vervolgens kies je een specialisme en volg je vakgerelateerde- en persoonlijke ontwikkelingstrainingen;
Ondertussen breng je alle kennis in de praktijk bij LeasePlan Digital en bouw je mee aan het worden van de grootse leasemaatschappij ter wereld.

Oh ja, gedurende je hele traineeship word je begeleid door een ervaren mentor waar je continu terecht kunt. Klinkt gaaf, toch?

Door jou maken we impact
Ben jij iemand die altijd het maximale uit zichzelf haalt? Vind je het belangrijk om een positieve impact te maken? LeasePlan Digital kan jouw data en digitale ambities goed gebruiken! LeasePlan Digital is continu bezig met het verbeteren van de efficiëntie en productiviteit in de wereldwijde auto lease-industrie. Met de digitale diensten van LeasePlan Digital zorgen voor betrouwbaar en efficiënt beheer van lease-auto's. Wil jij helpen de automotive lease-sector te transformeren? Lees dan snel verder!

Met de kennis en vaardigheden die je hebt opgedaan, kun je echt een verschil maken. Als er een wederzijdse klik is, kun je na je inwerkperiode je carrière tot grote hoogtes laten stijgen bij LeasePlan Digital. We hebben prachtige carrièrepaden uitgestippeld, waardoor je op jouw eigen tempo kunt doorgroeien van junior naar senior! Alles wat je leert, kun je bij LeasePlan Digital direct in de praktijk toepassen. LeasePlan Digital is gevestigd in een levendig pand aan de Zuidas in Amsterdam.

Vindt jouw rol is bij LeasePlan Digital
Als Data & Analytics Specialist bij LeasePlan Digital werk je in een multidisciplinair team van professionals om data te verzamelen, te analyseren en te presenteren. Je bouwt pipelines, creëert informatieve dashboards en optimaliseert het proces van dataverkrijging. Je bijdrage zal cruciaal zijn om van een versnipperd datamodel naar een centraal datamodel te gaan, met als voornaamste doel om de global data hub te bouwen en relevante data te delen met alle stakeholders.

Je werkt aan uiteenlopende projecten, zoals het leveren van dashboards voor operationele of financiële teams, het aanleveren van data aan leveranciers en het bouwen van pipelines voor datawarehouses. Als Data Hero bij LeasePlan Digital heb je de kans om deel uit te maken van een spannende reis, een pad te banen in de digitale transformatie van de leasemarkt, en een echte impact te maken op de manier waarop mensen wereldwijd gebruik maken van mobiliteit.

LeasePlan Digital zoekt versterking van:

Data Engineers
Data Modelleurs
Data Stewards

De kansen en doorgroeimogelijkheden bij LeasePlan Digital
LeasePlan Digital biedt een werkomgeving waarin je de ruimte krijgt om te leren en te groeien. Met ongeveer vijftien leads en een groeiend team van meer dan 150 professionals, zijn er volop mogelijkheden om zijwaarts of omhoog te bewegen binnen de organisatie. LeasePlan Digital heeft een functiehuis ontwikkeld waarin je je eigen doorgroeipaden kunt doorlopen.

Bij LeasePlan Digital werk je in een team waarin mensen graag een extra stapje zetten en waar ruimte is voor het delen van kennis en eigen inbreng. De data teams van LeasePlan Digital hebben een hechte teamcultuur en staan altijd klaar om elkaar te helpen. LeasePlan Digital zit in een spannende fase, we zijn bezig om de grootste leasemaatschappij ter wereld te worden. LeasePlan Digital in transitie naar een nieuwe architectuur en met nieuwe technieken. Jij krijgt de kans om hieraan bij te dragen.

Pas jij in het plaatje?
Voordat we inzoomen op de arbeidsvoorwaarden schetsen we onderstaand naar wat voor startende professionals we zoeken:

Een afgeronde HBO/WO-opleiding;
Uitstekende kennis van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal in woord en geschrift;
Analytisch en conceptueel denkvermogen en overtuigingskracht;
Jij bent een echte teamplayer en niet bang om vragen te stellen.

Communicatieve vaardigheden zijn bij LeasePlan Digital net zo belangrijk als technische vaardigheden. In de beginfase van je loopbaan bij LeasePlan Digital zul je met je soft skills je hardskills verbeteren. Je moet bereid zijn om vragen te stellen, op mensen af te stappen en proactief informatie te zoeken.

LeasePlan Digital waardeert zelfstarters en mensen die hun ambities en ideeën durven te uiten. We zoeken mensen die goed kunnen samenwerken, maar ook in staat zijn om zelfstandig te werken en verantwoordelijkheid te nemen. Idealiter heb je ook affiniteit met data-analyse in je vrije tijd of hobby, bijvoorbeeld door je bezig te houden met home automation of het meten van je eigen prestaties.

What's in it for me?
Bij KVL ademen we data. We begrijpen niet alleen data maar juist ook de menselijke kant van data. Daarom kun je zowel goede primaire als secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden van ons verwachten:

Een bruto salaris tussen de €3.000,- en €4.000, (afhankelijk van het aantal jaren werkervaring);
Kennisdeling, veel fun-activiteiten en borrels met gelijkgestemden;
Veel professionele aandacht voor je persoonlijke ontwikkeling, bijvoorbeeld aan de hand van jouw persoonlijk ondernemersplan;
We houden je fit met een bedrijfsfitnessregeling;
26 vakantiedagen (op basis van fulltime dienstverband);
We houden je mobiel met een NS Business card;
Je krijgt natuurlijk een laptop en een telefoonvergoeding;
Een top pensioenregeling.

KVL: Bringing Analytics To The People
KVL helpt organisaties om datagedreven te worden en meer waarde te halen uit data. Wij bieden daarvoor een complete dienstverlening aan vanuit vier business lines: Advies & Regie, Strategic Staffing, Digital Data Solutions en Analytics Academy.

Hoe werken bij KVL eruit ziet
Vraag het een van onze medewerkers en ze vertellen je waarschijnlijk dat werken bij KVL voelt alsof je deel uitmaakt van een familie. Dat komt omdat we onze nieuwe collega’s in de eerste plaats selecteren op hun persoonlijkheid. Dan pas op hun kennis en ervaring. We vinden het namelijk leuk om met elkaar samen te werken, kennis te delen, elkaar te inspireren of een borrel te drinken. Dat doen we dan ook regelmatig op ons hoofdkantoor in de oude Van Nelle Fabriek in Rotterdam.

We zijn een platte organisatie die erg gericht is op zelfsturing, eigen initiatief, continue verbetering en op het realiseren van meetbare en zichtbare resultaten bij onze klanten en binnen onze eigen organisatie. Zin, wil, energie en drive om zelf te groeien en om actief mee te bouwen aan ‘the next level’? Dan zijn wij misschien wel het juiste bedrijf voor jou.

Morgen een kop koffie?
Wil jij jouw carrière een impuls geven de komende jaren door ‘learning by earning’ centraal te stellen? Solliciteer dan direct!

Heb je nog inhoudelijke vragen over deze functie? Neem gerust contact met ons via recruitment@kvl.nl. Mariam neemt daarna snel contact met je op.

Bij KVL komen we altijd direct tot actie. De sollicitatieprocedure is helder en snel.

Na jouw sollicitatie nemen we bij interesse snel contact met je op. Dan organiseren we een korte telefonische kennismaking met Mariam.
Wanneer er van beide kanten een klik is, nodigen we je graag uit om nader kennis te maken en dan krijg je eventueel een online assessment.
Er is natuurlijk ruimte om kennis te maken met collega’s uit het team zodat je even mee kan kijken en vragen kunt stellen!
Nog steeds enthousiasme aan beide kanten? Dan sluiten we de sollicitatieprocedure af met een arbeidsvoorwaardengesprek.
linkedin_skills: English and Dutch

description:
Who we are looking for

Knowledge and experience with SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL etc.);
1+ years of experience with programming languages such as Python and R;
Experience with data visualization tools, such as Tableau, Qlik, PowerBI, d3.js, or equivalent would be considered as an advantage;
Knowledge of the Jupyter IDE would be considered as an advantage;
Major fields of study in statistics, econometrics, data analytics or other relevant areas;
Strong analytical and communication skills;
Fluency in English - both verbal and written

Your future role

The Data Scientist will join a regional team responsible for developing advanced analytics products; applying data visualization and statistical programming tools to enterprise data to advance and enable key mission outcomes. You can expect projects in which we use data analytics to advise our customers on important strategic, financial and operational issues.
Carry out economically sound simulations and impact analyzes and forecasts the effects of changed corporate and corporate structures. Recognize the interrelationships in big data, illustrate them with suitable visualizations and make the flood of data usable for the successful implementation of complex corporate transactions. Link customer data in a suitable way to form complex data models and use sophisticated analysis methods - such as regression, clustering or and text analytics.
Work with modern analysis tools and use our powerful analytics infrastructure. Present and represent your work results to the customer. Bring your knowledge and skills to both customer projects and projects for the development of product innovations.

What we offer

Competitive salary and social benefits; New projects where you can develop your skills;
Real impact on the business solutions;
Work in one of the world’s largest consulting firms
Work for well-known brands
Additional Wellness days (4)
Healthcare plan
Health insurance (mixed package)
Working across multiple geographies and clients
Travel Insurance

Selection process

Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. All applications will be considered under the terms and conditions of confidentiality in accordance with the regulations of personal data protection.

About Deloitte

Deloitte is a variety of people, experience, industries and services we deliver in 150 countries of the world. It is an intellectual challenge, a good starting point for your career, and an excellent opportunity for continuous development and gaining valuable life experiences.What you only must do is to take the first step – press the apply button and send us your CV, go through all the stages of the recruitment process and sign a contract with us. Deloitte is simply your best choice.

About The Team

Do you want to build your brand by working for a leading consulting firm that drives eminence in the marketplace? Are you interested in leveraging your analytical skills and strategic ideas to improve mission execution? If so, Deloitte could be the place for you! Our team brings deep industry expertise, rigorous analytical capabilities and a pragmatic mindset to help solve our client’s most complex business problems. je hebt een bachelor- / master-niveau of gelijkwaardig door ervaring in soortgelijke functie

je werkt heel nauwgezet

je kan beslissen
je durft verantwoordelijkheid te nemen
je bent stressbestendig

loon bespreekbaar volgens ervaring

description:
Var Groupcon un fatturato di 572 milioni di € al 30 aprile 2022, oltre 3.400 collaboratori e una presenza estesa in Italia e in 10 paesi all’estero (Francia, Germania, Spagna, Romania, Austria, Svizzera, Cina, Messico, USA e Tunisia), è uno dei principali leader nel settore dei servizi e delle soluzioni digitali.

Le offerte e soluzioni Var Group si rinnovano quotidianamente grazie alla ricerca continua e alla stretta collaborazione con Start up e Poli Universitari, consentendogli di essere al fianco dei maggiori distretti italiani quali Manufacturing, Food & Beverage, Pharma, Automotive, Meccanico, Fashion & Luxury, Furniture, GDO & Retail.

Scegliendo Var Group, entrerai a far parte di unGreat Place to Work. Nel 2022 abbiamo infatti ottenuto la certificazione, che premia la nostra realtà come azienda nella quale si sta bene e si lavora bene.

Posizione:

Per il proprio competence center Var Prime, interamente dedicato allo sviluppo di progetti di Digital Transformation basati su tecnologia Microsoft, siamo alla ricerca di una figura di Sviluppatore Power BI

Nell’ambito delle progettualità su piattaforma Microsoft BC avrai la possibilità di:

Analizzare, disegnare e sviluppare Reportistica e Dashboard con Microsoft Power BI nonché occuparti del re-engineering di dashboard preesistenti
Avere capacità di gestire in autonomia deploy delle componenti Applicative
Analizzare ed interpretare i requisiti per fornire soluzioni personalizzate
Mantenimento delle conoscenze sulle tendenze del settore e sulle nuove funzionalità di Power BI
Collaborazione con il team di sviluppo software per garantire l'integrazione dei dati tra diverse fonti e la qualità dei dati stessi
Se hai almeno 5-6 anni di esperienzanel ruolo e vuoi crescere e dare una svolta alla tua carriera, allora stiamo cercando proprio te!

Requisiti:

Hard skills:

Esperienza nella gestione di banche dati, relazionali e non, nonché nella modellazione di dati complessi tramite Power BI
Conoscenza delle tecniche e degli strumenti Microsoft SQL, SSIS, SSAS, SSRS, Power BI, nonché di concetti e tecniche di Data Warehousing e Business Intelligence
Capacità di disegno e implementazione di report e dashboard tramite Power BI, oltre che conoscenza delle architetture e del licensing di Power BI
Conoscenza DAX e SQL
Conoscenza piattaforma Azure (Azure Data Factory, Azure SQL Data Base, Azure Data Lake) e integrazioni Cloud
Soft Skills:

Proattività e attitudine al problem solving
Competenze di Leadership
Autonomia nel gestire le proprie attività nell'ambito di tempi e modalità prefissate
Completano il profilo:

Gradita conoscenza SQL server e strumenti di analisi dati Analisys Services
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese
Altre informazioni:

Var Group, più che un luogo di lavoro, è un ambiente aperto all’innovazione, alla ricerca e alla condivisione di esperienze eccellenti. Una realtà nella quale è possibile crescere e ricoprire ruoli sfidanti, sempre in stretta relazione con i leader mondiali del settore.

I nostri uffici si trovano a: Milano, Roma, Verona, Caserta, Genova ed Empoli e sono stati rinnovati per migliorare l’esperienza di lavoro in sede. Applichiamo politiche molto flessibili di smart working.

Cosa offriamo

Flessibilità lavorativa
Ambiente di lavoro dinamico e in forte crescita
Formazione continua
Percorso di carriera personalizzato
Welfare aziendale
Mensa o Ticket
Var Group S.p.A. promuove e persegue politiche di inclusione sociale, tutela della diversità e dell’equità, con un impegno costante verso la valorizzazione del proprio capitale umano e della cultura aziendale, contro ogni forma di discriminazione.

Var Group S.p.A. garantisce un approccio equo, meritocratico e trasparente al fine di creare un’organizzazione che ponga al centro la persona, valorizzando i differenti background, esperienze e competenze di ciascun individuo. Miriamo ad attirare, selezionare e trattenere i migliori talenti, attuando processi di selezione obiettivi ed imparziali ed offrendo piani di sviluppo professionale tesi alla valorizzazione delle competenze e delle capacità personali.

description:
Scripted Speech Data Collection | Italy

Collection has STARTED! Get ready to be part of an exciting era in AI-powered communication!

In AI-powered communication, data collection is a critical component to ensure that communication is effective and personalized. AI-powered communication systems use machine learning algorithms to understand users' preferences and behavior, which can improve the accuracy and relevance of communication.

Appen is an Information Technology company that specializes in providing high-quality training data, content moderation, and language services to improve the development of artificial intelligence and machine learning models. We provide opportunities for remote and part-time work that enable individuals to earn extra income while staying at home!

Project Description:
In this project, you will be reading and recording a series of prompts by following instructions displayed in the Appen Mobile app.
There is a total of 200-300 prompts (depending on your language), which will take approximately 1 hour to complete.

This has a short-term earning potential and we are looking for participants who are: Italian speaker and currently residing in Italy.

description:
Data Analyst & Operations Manager

We're looking for a motivated data driven person who will help us shape our team, drive the company to the next level, and have the most direct influence on our success. This position is available in Oeiras - Lisbon Hybrid mode (On-site and Remote).

You solve problems by connecting your holistic business knowledge, marketing understanding and deep dive analytical abilities
You are our truffle hunter, who quickly finds smart and pragmatic ways through complex datasets and recognises patterns in business KPIs and marketing channels
You autonomously realize projects in cooperation with other colleagues as well as with marketing channels which serve the management as a strategic decision-making basis for growth and excellence
You filter growth relevant information from our BI/tracking systems and convert complexity into simplicity
You find strategies to automate marketing campaigns, improve targeting and drive marketing efficiency
You monitor business relevant KPIs on a regular basis and find new ways for automated reporting systems
You monitor business supply chain on a regular basis to ensure our stock is up to our potential sales

Degree in Engineering, TI, Business Informatics, Economics, Statistics, Data Science or similar
Strong analytical skills: able to break down problems, test hypotheses, track the impact of solutions on the respective problems.
Great experience with tools such as Excel and PowerBI or similar
Know-how in Google Analytics is nice to have
Know-how in Facebook Ads is nice to have
Know-how in segmentation is nice to have
Fluent in English and Portuguese; every other European language is a plus

You have an impact. With innovation and smart technology, we create comfy sustainable shoes and digital assets for the future generations. We want your ideas and give you autonomy to make them reality.
At Undo For Tomorrow we are flexible. Organize your own schedule, and balance work between the office and home as it’s best for you. We give you trust-based hours and a flexible smart working policy.
Teamwork makes the dream work. Our team has people from 3 different continents. We work in a multicultural environment where we can challenge and support each other.
We’re building for the long term, and that means protecting our planet. We constantly test new green technologies and new opportunities, both physical and digital.

We are a Brazilian / European footwear startup with headquarters in Lisbon preparing to sell globally. We started not so long ago (2021) and we are growing fast with many challenges and new market opportunities to unlock.
We believe that innovation and technology allied to sustainability is key to success in one of the most competitive markets on the planet. Our goal is to bring comfort and well being to our growing community.
Our journey has just begun. Are you ready to join us and help shape the future?

Undofortomorrow is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. description:
LoJack® (NASDAQ: CAMP) è un pioniere della telematica che guida la trasformazione in un'economia globale connessa.

Con oltre 40 anni di esperienza nel recupero dei veicoli rubati, si è specializzata nell’offerta di soluzioni telematiche e servizi innovativi applicati al settore Automotive per offrire soluzioni end-to-end e modulabili sulle esigenze di case auto, concessionari, flotte, noleggiatori, assicurazioni e driver.

Oggi può contare in Italia su oltre 400.000 clienti e si avvale della tecnologia telematica e dei servizi software di CalAmp per creare un nuovo livello di valore per i partner del settore Automotive, del mercato assicurativo, società di noleggio, e dei loro clienti finali attraverso soluzioni innovative facilmente fruibili.

Generando profitto per i suoi partner attraverso programmi innovativi integrati ai processi di loyalty, vendita, remarketing e service, ha raggiunto oggi 20 milioni di prodotti installati e oltre 1,3 milioni di abbonati a servizi software a livello globale.

LoJack Italia è alla ricerca di un talentuoso Analyst da inserire all’interno del team Financial Planning & Analysis del reparto Finance.

Il candidato riporterà direttamente al Financial Planning & Analysis Manager e collaborerà in prima persona con il Direttore Finance.

Responsabilità

Controllo di gestione e analisi di profittabilità
Preparazione Consuntivi, Forecast periodici, Budget e Business Plan
Monitoraggio del ciclo attivo e del Cash Flow
Gestione del piano logistico e dell’approvvigionamento dei prodotti/monitoraggio del inventory turnover
Supporto alla direzione vendite per la partecipazione a bandi di gara e definizione di proposte commerciali

Qualifiche e soft skills

Laurea in discipline economiche
Esperienza consolidata di almeno 4 anni nella medesima mansione presso realtà strutturate
Conoscenza ed applicazione dei Principi Contabili Nazionali (OIC) ed Internazionali (IFRS e IAS)
Conoscenza dell’applicativo Oracle Cloud
Ottima conoscenza dei principali strumenti di Microsoft Office (in particolare Excel, Word, PowerPoint e Outlook)
Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese, scritta e parlata
Spiccate capacità di problem solving e leadership
Proattività e flessibilità organizzativa completano il profilo

description:
Job Reference #

277350BR

Job Type

Full Time

Your role

Are you curious about financial analytics and its applications within the investment and risk management life-cycle?

Are you passionate about solving business problems and making an impact?

Do you have technical skills you are interested in applying within the Asset Management Industry?

We're looking for someone like that to:

work with members of our team to support our data, analytics, risk and credit research platforms
maintain and enhance the data content to facilitate reporting solutions for internal/external clients

provide front-line support to portfolio managers and research analysts across the investment life-cycle

perform portfolio and data analyses in support of portfolio managers and investment specialist teams
partner with internal groups across Global AM to scale our model for efficiency that will accommodate

and facilitate future client growth

Your team

You'll be working in the Knowledge Services team in Krakow. Sitting at the intersection of business and technology teams, Knowledge Services provides data and support to our teams around the globe. The team is a part of the Asset Management COO and has a mandate to govern and commercialize data through innovative technology and services.

Diversity helps us grow, together. That’s why we are committed to fostering and advancing diversity, equity, and inclusion. It strengthens our business and brings value to our clients.

Your expertise

You have:

– a university degree in an analytical field like business or finance or information technology

– an understanding of major security asset classes (equities, bonds, futures and OTC instruments) and key data attributes associated with them

– strong communication skills, verbal and written

– excellent problem-solving skills

– working knowledge of leading market data platforms (e.g. Bloomberg) is a plus

You are:

– intellectually curious, accountable and data driven

– a self-started with the ability to work with minimal supervision

– an individual who possesses a positive, action-oriented attitude and understands the importance of taking initiative within a team environment

– able to challenge the status quo and suggest viable and actionable alternative approaches

About Us

UBS is the world’s largest and only truly global wealth manager. We operate through four business divisions: Global Wealth Management, Personal & Corporate Banking, Asset Management and the Investment Bank. Our global reach and the breadth of our expertise set us apart from our competitors.

With more than 70,000 employees, we have a presence in all major financial centers in more than 50 countries. Do you want to be one of us?

Join us

At UBS, we embrace flexible ways of working when the role permits. We offer different working arrangements like part-time, job-sharing and hybrid (office and home) working. Our purpose-led culture and global infrastructure help us connect, collaborate, and work together in agile ways to meet all our business needs.

From gaining new experiences in different roles to acquiring fresh knowledge and skills, we know that great work is never done alone. We know that it's our people, with their unique backgrounds, skills, experience levels and interests, who drive our ongoing success. Together we’re more than ourselves. Ready to be part of #teamUBS and make an impact?

Disclaimer / Policy Statements

UBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce.

description:
Enertis Applus+es una firma global de Consultoría e Ingeniería, líder en el sector de las energías renovables y soluciones de almacenamiento. Tenemos presencia en más de 65 países, y participación en diferentes asociaciones del sector.

Nuestra experiencia y «know-how» garantiza soluciones adaptadas a los desafíos y problemas de nuestros clientes. Perseguimos la excelencia asegurando la calidad y la mejora continua de nuestras actividades y procesos, alcanzando los más altos estándares de calidad.

Somos una empresa ágil y transparente, que asegura la neutralidad y apuesta firmemente por el asesoramiento al cliente.

Debido al crecimiento exponencial en el mercado estadounidense que ha experimentado Enertis durante estos años, se ha generado gran cantidad de conocimiento tanto en cuanto al mercado como de las diferentes tecnologías y competidores.

Como organización que aprende y se preocupa por el aprendizaje de sus empleados, buscamos de manera constante la manera de mantener actualizado el conocimiento de las personas que forman parte de nuestro equipo, para continuar siendo competitivos y líderes en nuestro sector.

Es por eso que actualmente, buscamos un/a analista,que tendrá el objetivo principal de realizar un inventario de todos los conocimientos existentesen la organización, así como de ampliarlos con fuentes externas.

El/la Analista se integraría al equipo de Data Science & Consulting,y su sede prncipal serían nuestras oficinas de Madrid,aunque sería tutorizado de manera directa por su director en EEUU. Debido a su rol, tendrá relación con el resto de los departamentos de la empresa tanto a nivel local como en el resto de las filiales internacionales. Entre otras, sus funcionesincluirían:

Profundizar en su conocimiento en la empresa y nuestra área de para lo cual dispondrá de pleno acceso a todos los documentos generados internamente en Enertis.
Organizar dicho conocimiento y transformarlo en contenidos formativos para los empleados (en diferentes formatos) y manuales para los trabajadores actuales y nuevas incorporaciones.
Poner en marcha iniciativas que, basadas en soporte informático, hagan de esta información un inventario fácilmente accesible para cualquier persona de la organización.
Participar de manera activa en los estudios realizados por el departamento
Identificar, parametrizar e interpretar los resultados de estos estudios arrojen.

¿Qué buscamos?

Grado universitario
Nivel avanzado del paquete Office

description:
Description du poste Intitulé du poste

Data and Performance marketing manager H/F

Métier

Stratégie et développement - Etudes et Performance

Catégorie socio-professionnelle

Cadre

Description De La Mission

Développer la connaissance client et déterminer les insights stratégiques permettant de nourrir la création:

En s’appropriant les études existantes et en formulant des recommandations sur les nouvelles études à mener à partir de nos datas internes par marché stratégique : profil client, segmentation, analyse des comportements et des parcours clients (cookies, navigation…)
En suivant la mise en œuvre de ces études
En s’assurant de la fiabilité des données et leur interprétation
En s’appuyant sur les solutions d'analyse de données existantes (modèles, scoring, exploration) ou en accompagnant le développement de nouvelles solutions.
En formulant des recommandations sur la restitution des résultats/analyses de façon dynamique à partir des outils de Data visualisation existants ou en accompagnant le développement de nouvelles solutions.

Améliorer nos performances de campagne (Awareness, considération, trafic):

En identifiant et définissant les KPIs pertinents selon les typologies de clients définis dans la segmentation;
En analysant nos performances de campagne de communication marketing;
En faisant des recommandations stratégiques et opérationnelles;
En mettant en place des dashbords de suivi des KPI;
En recommandant des modèles d’attribution, notamment pour la communication offline (MMM), pilotant leur déploiement et l’analyse des résultats.

Profil recherché

Titulaire d'un bca+5, vous justifiez d'une expérience d'environ 5 ans dans le monde de la data marketing/Etudes. Au cours de votre parcours, vous avez eu l'opportunité de mettre votre expertise au service des utilisateurs.

Expert d'Excel, de PowerBI et Spotfire, vous maîtrisez le langage des bases de données SQL et l'univers des flux de données. Vous maîtrisez la logique de construction de bases de données.

Vous avez également pu exercer en équipe avec les équipes de la Data et de l'IT.

Vous avez un goût pour les visualisations pertinentes à vocation pédagogique.
Vous vous inscrivez dans un processus de compréhension métier et vous aimez les besoins et la pertinence des hypothèses et KPIs en place.
Vous savez simplifier/vulgariser les concepts compliqués pour en faire des informations appréhendables par tous.

Rejoignez nous!

Type de contrat

CDI

Type d'horaires

Administratif

Localisation du poste Localisation du poste

France, Ile-de-France, Val d'Oise (95)

Site

45 rue de Paris 95747 ROISSY CHARLES DE GAULLE CEDEX

description:
Intesa Sanpaolo è un gruppo bancario internazionale, leader in Italia e fra i primi 5 gruppi dell'area euro con oltre 20 milioni di clienti in Italia e all’estero. Estremamente innovativo è anche motore di crescita sostenibile e inclusiva, con impatto concreto sulla società e con un forte impegno per l’ambiente.

Scopo e Attività
Siamo alla ricerca di persone con competenze in ambito IT e specializzazione sulle tematiche in ambito bancario, che sappiano gestire la complessità con sicurezza e fiducia, che siano in grado di analizzare le necessità business scomponendo nel dettaglio i requisiti funzionali garantendone atomicità e assenza di conflitto.

Lavorerai all’interno del team di IsyAccount per la nuova Banca Digitale Isybank e analizzerai i requisiti utente, progetterai e gestirai i processi di test, quality assurance e di rilascio in modalità agile e/o waterfall.

Le principali attività:

Analizzare, progettare e/o reingegnerizzare i processi di business interni valutandone la fattibilità, i rischi e gli impatti sulle soluzioni IT esistenti oppure individuando nuove soluzioni
Condurre l’analisi dei requisiti di Business necessaria allo sviluppo di nuove soluzioni IT e al miglioramento di quelle esistenti, curando la relazione con il business owner banca
Affiancare e supportare le strutture di test interagendo con tutti gli stakeholder progettuali
Redigere il documento di analisi funzionale in conformità con i requisiti espressi
Verificare e garantire la correttezza funzionale dei processi e delle soluzioni IT aziendali e la coerenza del disegno della base dati.
Collaborare a stretto contatto con il team di progetto, in particolare con il team di sviluppo IT affinché vengano comprese le esigenze dell’utente e vengano sviluppate nel modo corretto
Curare la progettazione, documentazione e coordinamento dei collaudi delle soluzioni IT, supportando gli utenti e validando il processo di test end-to-end
Supportare il responsabile di riferimento nelle varie fasi del ciclo di vita del software curando le attività di reporting dello stato di avanzamento lavori
Sviluppare la conoscenza del modello dati delle applicazioni che sono oggetto di evoluzione, predisponendo anche l’opportuna documentazione

Esperienza Richiesta
1-3 anni di esperienza in progetti IT a medio/alta complessità preferibilmente nel contesto bancario, finanziario o settore creditizio.

Qualifiche Richieste, Skills

Laurea o diploma specialistico ad indirizzo informatico-scientifico (matematica, fisica, ingegneria informatica)
Buona padronanza della lingua inglese
Ottima conoscenza degli strumenti del pacchetto Office 365
Conoscenza delle fasi progettuali in ambito IT (analisi dei requisiti di business, declinazione in analisi funzionale, etc) e delle metodologie di stima
Conoscenza delle metodologie di sviluppo Waterfall
Conoscenza delle metodologie di sviluppo Agile Scrum
Conoscenza di base di software per la modellazione di dati
Conoscenza di base delle principali tecnologie utilizzate per lo sviluppo delle applicazioni

Concorre a titolo preferenziale aver conoscenza degli strumenti di logging ed aver svolto attività specifiche nell’ambito delle app mobile nel settore bancario, finanziario o creditizio

Entra a far parte di una realtà internazionale e innovativa. Il futuro non si aspetta, si sceglie!

#sharingfuture

description:
Détail de l'offre

Informations générales

Entité de rattachementNous sommes une ESN agile, un groupe international certifié Top Employer Europe 2023.

A l'ère de la post-transformation digitale, nous mettons tout en œuvre pour que chacun de nos 27 000 athlètes du digital puisse se renouveler perpétuellement, en vivant positivement son propre flow digital.

Chacun de nos talents peut ainsi façonner son parcours de carrière selon ses appétences, entreprendre de manière pragmatique avec ses clients pour un monde à impact positif, innover localement dans 27 pays et harmoniser son investissement professionnel et son bien-être personnel.

Rejoignez Inetum. Live your positive digital flow.

Tous nos postes sont ouverts aux personnes en situation de handicap.

Description du poste Métier

Métier AS (Application Services) - Consultant

Intitulé du poste

Data Analyst H/F

Contrat

CDI

Description De La Mission

Rejoignez les équipes de la Practice Data Centre Ouest Inetum

Plus de 100 collaborateurs spécialisés dans la Data, sur 9 agences (Brest, Lanion, Caen, Nantes, Orléans, Le Mans, Niort, Rennes, Tours) assurent la proximité des interventions pour nos clients
Au sein de la communauté, les collaborateurs bénéficient de partages de connaissances, de formations et de parcours de certifications. Les certifications sont travaillées en groupe de révision, avec si possibles des environnements de travail partagés sur la technologie (ex Azure, Databricks, GCP, Informatica, partenaires du groupe inetum). Des projets internes peuvent également être mis en œuvre pour explorer et construire dans un environnement « fail safe ».
Les équipes Centre Ouest sont en lien avec les autres régions, notre centre d’expertise parisien (> 70 collaborateurs) et nos équipes d’outsourcing. Une équipe Innovation apporte l’état de l’art de notre R&D dans nos agences (ex NLP, data vision, IA, ML)
Au sein de nos équipes ou de nos plateaux projets, vous prenez en charge la conception, la réalisation ou le maintien en opération des reporting de nos clients.

En tant que data analyst, vous concentrer votre activité sur l’analyse de données avec un prisme métier, afin d’orienter des décisions (réflexion autour de la construction d’un tableau de bord, sur l’identification des données sources, sur les flux d’alimentation et les contrôles nécessaires).

Dans ce cadre, vous pouvez être amenés à participer aux activités suivantes

Echanges et coordination avec les équipes décisionnelles, les data scientists et les experts métiers et les responsables des systèmes sources
Conception des indicateurs (KPI) et des restitutions sous un format exploitable en concertation avec les utilisateurs clefs.
Utilisation des différents outils à disposition pour explorer, organiser et exploiter les données.
Veille pour développer la capacité de conseil des clients sur les outils (ex ETL vs ELT, data quality, data catalog, MDM, PIM)

Profil

De formation supérieure Bac +5, écoles d'ingénieur(e)s, vous disposez au moins une expérience significative dans la construction de tableau de bord.

Les technologies privilégiées sur ce post sont en priorité Power Bi, Qlik Sense ou BO. Des compétences sur Looker, Tableau ou d’autres outils de visualisation sont appréciées.

Des compétences ETL, Spark ou Python sont un plus.

Vous disposez également de bonnes capacités de modélisation, de formation et de synthèse.

Les bases de l’agilité sont un prérequis. La dynamique d’équipe et la proactivité sont essentielles pour nous vous faites preuve d'un excellent relationnel 😉

Localisation du poste Localisation du poste

France, Ouest, 44 Loire-Atlantique

Ville

Nantes

Critères candidat Niveau d'études min. requis

Bac+5

Niveau d'expérience min. requis

Plus de 2 ans

description:
At IONOS, the leading European provider of cloud infrastructure, cloud services and hosting services, you will work together with a wide range of teams. We are characterized by open structures, a friendly working culture and flat hierarchies with a strong team spirit. We firmly believe that work and fun are compatible, and offer you the right environment for this. Our constant growth means that we are always looking for new colleagues. Become part of IONOS and grow with us.

Your Tasks:

You have a degree in Business Information Systems or a comparable course of study as well as several years of experience in the field of Business Intelligence and are looking for an exciting challenge in a dynamic, internationally operating company. In addition, you have:

You will enable data-based enterprise management by preparing and merging raw data and making it available using modern BI technologies.
You will be the contact person for existing reports their data quality, and you will be available to our internal customers in an advisory capacity.
You will create suitable evaluations for complex inquiries.
You will develop ideas to continuously optimize data storage, processing, and provision.

We Appreciate:

You have a degree in Business Information Systems or a comparable course of study as well as several years of experience in the field of Business Intelligence and are looking for an exciting challenge in a dynamic, internationally operating company. In addition, you have:

Analytical skills and enjoy communicating at all levels of the organization.
A team-oriented and structured approach to work.
A high degree of initiative, a quick grasp and enthusiasm for exciting tasks.
Application-safe MS Office skills as well as a good command of English.

About IONOS

IONOS is the leading European digitalization partner for small and medium-sized businesses (SMB). The company serves around six million customers and operates across 18 markets in Europe and North America, with its services being accessible worldwide. With its Web Presence & Productivity portfolio, IONOS acts as a 'one-stop shop' for all digitalization needs: from domains and web hosting to classic website builders and do-it-yourself solutions, from e-commerce to online marketing tools. In addition, the company offers Cloud Solutions to enterprises who are looking to move to the cloud as their businesses evolve.

We value diversity and welcome all applications - regardless of, for example, gender, nationality, ethnic or social origin, religion, disability, age as well as sexual orientation and identity, physical characteristics, marital status or any other irrelevant factor subject to applicable law.

description:
About TPV Technology

TPV Technology is an internationally-renowned PC monitor, TV and Digital Signage Displays manufacturer. TPV serves as an original design manufacturer for some of the best-known TV , PC and Digital Signage Displays brands in the industry and distributes its products worldwide under its own brands AOC and Envision. In addition, the company designs, produces and sells Philips-branded monitors, TV's and AVA products, Digital Signage Displays and mobile phones through a license agreement with Philips via its subsidiaries TP Vision and MMD. As an example, the company brings high-quality TV sets to the market: smart and easy to use with sophisticated styling. TPV believes in creating products that touch the human senses and are within reach of all consumers in the markets they operate in. As a leader in the hotel industry, their hospitality TV division serves most the world's major international and national hotel groups, as well as individual hotels, hospitals, cruises and other professional facilities.

About TP Vision

TP Vision is a consumer electronics key player in the world of audio visual digital entertainment. TP Vision concentrates on developing, manufacturing and marketing Philips branded TV sets (Europe, Russia, Middle East, South America, India and selected countries in Asia-Pacific) and audio products (all around the Globe). We do this by combining the innovative Philips brand heritage with our design expertise, operational excellence, flexibility and speed of TPV Technology. With these combined strengths, we bring high-quality TV sets to the market: smart and easy to use with sophisticated styling. We believe in creating products that offer a superior audio and visual experience for consumers. With Philips TVs, TP Vision is a global leader in the hospitality market. TP Vision is the exclusive brand licensee of Philips TVs for the above listed countries and, on the global stage for the Philips audio products.TP Vision employs close to 2,000 people in several locations around the globe and is 100% owned by TPV, one of the world’s leading monitor and LCD TV manufacturers, selling and marketing Philips branded TVs in China. TPV has been able to drive its growth over the years by leveraging its economies of scale and core competencies in R&D, manufacturing, logistic efficiency and quality.

Scope

You will be responsible for the preparation and the implementation of the Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR)-Directive. The first year will be focused on the execution of a double materiality assessment, gap assessment of the CSR-Directive criteria and an EU Taxonomy assessment. After these assessments you will define the roadmap and coordinate with the data owners how to comply with the CSR-Directive.

What Do We Offer You

A new, fulltime position and flexible working (from our refurbished European HQ office in Amsterdam, opposite from Amstel station, and from home)
An entrepreneurial, dynamic, challenging, and fast-moving international working environment, working with great brands
Fast decision-making environment / flat organisation
Competitive remunerationEducation And Related Experience

Master’s Degree in a relevant field
5-10 years proven experience in Sustainability or Compliance
Knowledge of Integrated & sustainability reporting standards and EcoVadis methodology
Fluent in English
Excellent project management skills
Proven track record in independent project management (including budgets, timelines, deliverables and reporting)
Strong analytics skills and communication skills
Strong experience in internal and external stakeholder management
Ambition to grow sustainability skills and the drive to successfully manage multiple projects running at the same time
Critical thinker with strong problem-solving skills
Strong interpersonal and communication skills, stakeholder management skills within and outside the company, and within multicultural diverse organizations
Ambitious, pro-active, high drive for getting-things-done
Able to work independently in dynamic fast changing business environmentMore Info

If you enjoy working with knowledgeable, success-oriented people, for a company that both challenges and respects its professionals, and you've got what it takes to be a great Sustainability Reporting Specialist, then apply today. Please contact Monique Manger (Corporate Recruiter) at info@careersattpvision.com (please include your CV and a short motivation).

Acquisition as a result of this vacancy posting is not appreciated.

Bei Bluecode bauen wir das europäische mobile Zahlungssystem auf. Eine Lösung aus und für Europa, die mobiles Bezahlen in Kombination mit Mehrwertdiensten ermöglicht. Schon jetzt sind wir im Handel in Österreich und Deutschland weit verbreitet und in einer Vielzahl von Apps wie der Bluecode App, der jö App oder der Müller App und in diversen Fußballvereinen und Kantinen als Zahlungslösung integriert. Ability to collaborate / Teamwork
Creativity & Innovation / Problem solving
Ability to understand, explain and support change
Ability to develop and adapt a process
Why joining BNP Paribas?

Leading banking institution
BNP Paribas is a leader in the Eurozone, and a prominent international banking institution with strong roots in Europe's banking history. It has a presence in 65 countries, with around 190 000 Employees – including more than 145 000 in Europe.

Our presence in Portugal
Since 1985, BNP Paribas was one of the first foreign banks to operate in the country. Today, the Group has around 7.100 employees across several entities operating directly in the territory, offering a wide range of integrated financial solutions to support its clients and their businesses.

International reach
BNP Paribas Holds Key Positions In Its Three Core Operating Divisions

Thanks to its international presence and regular and close collaboration among its different entities, BNP Paribas has the resources to support all clients with financing, investment, savings and protection solutions that help make their projects a success.

Retail Banking, a division that brings together all of the Group’s retail activities and specialised business lines;
Investment & Protection Services that include specialised businesses offering a wide range of savings, investment and protection services;
Corporate & Institutional Banking division that offers tailored financial solutions for corporate and institutional clients.
Diversity and Inclusion commitment
BNP Paribas is an equal opportunity employer and proud to provide equal employment opportunity to all job seekers. We are actively committed to ensuring that no individual is discriminated against on the grounds of age, disability, gender reassignment, marriage or civil partnership status, pregnancy and maternity/paternity, race, religion or belief, sex or sexual orientation. Equity and diversity are at the core of our recruitment policy because we believe that they foster creativity and efficiency, which in turn increase performance and productivity. We strive to reflect the society we live in, while keeping with the image of our clients.

Commitment towards work/life balance
At BNP Paribas we care about our employees wellbeing and promote a culture of good integration between work and rest. We believe our employees have rich personal lives outside of work, being fundamental to be disconnected from work to recharge both physically and mentally. Only through this balance we may all be at our best while working.

Remote Working Conditions
At BNP Paribas, we embrace a Smart Working framework based on trust, autonomy and collaboration. Within this framework, eligible employees can benefit from flexible remote working modalities adapted to our hybrid working environment. To guarantee a comfortable and efficient working set-up, eligible employees are provided with both the office and home equipment, are entitled to an equipment allowance and can benefit from exclusive partnerships to purchase additional equipment at reduced prices.

To find out more on why you should join BNP Paribas visit https://bnpp.lk/why-BNP-Paribas-Portugal

description:
The Search Group is a Risk and Research consultancy firm with a global footprint, and an enhanced presence in both Europe and East Asia. Our global clients rely upon us for due diligence, business intelligence, and specialist research products. We are also available to assist clients develop their ethics and governance programs - covering regulatory and financial crime compliance, ESG and business conduct. TSG is growing quickly hence is looking for motivated and committed people to join our local and global teams across all areas.

Job Summary

As Research Analyst you will be part of our Operations team and will report directly to the Regional Manager. You will be an individual contributor; however, you will also be working with our more Senior Research Analysts and Editors to help on projects and their professional development As a Research Analyst, you will conduct research on internet and web-based media databases, and write high-quality reports on companies and/or individuals using a combination of publicly-available and proprietary sources. In this role, you must ensure that the reports and daily updates meet the requirements in terms of content quality, accuracy, timeliness and completeness by establishing and monitoring adherence The Search Group’s leading standards.

Role And Responsibilities

Conduct research on internet or web-based media databases.

Produce high quality reports involving research and Analysis in different languages. For this position it is required that the candidate is fluent in English and Russian
Conduct first level quality control through peer review
Carry out watchlist database screening on the subjects of the Due Diligence checks
Provide input on the report writing process to help improve the quality and efficiency of the Research team
Engage with the Research team in other offices, seeking feedback, obtaining updates, managing delivery expectation on the quality of reports
Remain knowledgeable of regional and industry trends
Partner with other teams to ensure the integrity of key products
Demonstrate a hands-on approach to work and willing to participate in ad-hoc projects on short notice

Qualifications, Skills & Education Requirements

Tertiary level degree ideally in Law, Political Science, International Business, Accounting, Finance, Economics.
Minimum 2-3 years of due diligence, professional services engagements or in similar report generation.
Ability to oversee and support other research analysts and monitor work of less experienced colleagues.
Leadership and management skills to oversee and manage projects effectively.
Excellent Research skills across all media; significant understanding of risk areas and compliance related items and the ability to explain these to other research analysts.
Ability to handle ad hoc research into new areas and bespoke research.
Knowledge of the following Systems/IT: Office products, internet searches, social media.
Timeliness: deliver reports on time and consistently.
Dedication and commitment to continual learning.
Client focused approach.
Highest levels of integrity and displays this regularly.
This is a WFH position based on the country where it is advertised.

Please submit your CV or Resume in English.

description:
Who We Are

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialised in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing.

Our purpose?

Every day we boost our clients’ data transformation into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations.

Our strength?

Our data services stand on a double expertise: the combination of Artificial Intelligence and the business prowess acquired from our customers around the world, such as AccorHotels, Orange, Carrefour, Engie, Samsung, L'Oréal, Nissan...

Artefact’s success comes from a unique mix of company assets: cutting-edge data technologies, agile methodologies for fast delivery, cohesive teams assembling the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital marketing experts.

Artefact is looking for a Data Analyst Specialist for our clients, in order to reinforce our multiple data marketing offers.

Artefact Is

13 offices in Paris, London, Shanghai, Dubai...
900 employees
4 practices: Data Consulting, Data Marketing, Activation and Creation
What you will be doing: Key responsibilities

As a Data Analyst Specialist, Your Role Will Encompass

Creating and implementing a tagging plan, using analytics tools according to the template and basic configuration
Performing audit reports and creating web analysis studies (client journey, landing page, channels ROI) by defining and monitoring different KPIs and PIs
Monitoring different activities that can be impacted by web analytics (Activation, UX/CRO, tracking, trafficking).
Actively contributing to the expertise level and competencies of the Data & Analytics team
Closely collaborate with the other divisions (Media & Activation, Creation, Consulting, Data Science and Data Infrastructure) to provide data-driven marketing services to your clients

Academic level of education (Bachelor or Master)

A Mentor: your clients and teams naturally seek you out for advice
An Adventurer: you’re an entrepreneur constantly looking for business opportunities
Why you should join us

Artefact is the place to be: come and build the future of marketing
Progress: every day offers new challenges and new opportunities to learn
Culture: join the best team you could ever imagine
Entrepreneurship: you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry!
Come join us!

description:
About The Job

This is a great opportunity to join a dynamic and pivotal project in General Insurance as a Tester in the UAT team with a leading Insurance company in South Dublin. This is a temporary 9 month contract with an immediate start. You'll be working in a team for a key strategic project in General Insurance. The project is key to this organisation's digital strategy for Commercial Lines business.

You can expect to work on a range of different product types and with various teams and business areas within G.I and with external third party suppliers. Working with colleagues in both the business and in more technical teams to test requirements and to ensure systems are suitable for end users.

This is an excellent opportunity to learn new skills and expand your experience in a broad, vibrant and dynamic area.

What will you be doing?

Act as Test Analyst on key change initiatives ensuring compliance to test processes and quality standards.
Analyse business requirements and design tests to ensure that business requirements are met.
Contribute to definition of test approach.
Design test suites with comprehensive coverage.
Design and management of test data.
Produce detailed, accurate estimates.
Test execution to agreed service standards.
Defect investigation, resolution and management.
Providing detailed reports using Microsoft Excel.
Skills & Experience

3rd level degree (IT related)
At least 3 years experience in a test role.
Experience in a general insurance role would be beneficial.
Strong attention to detail is a must.
Analytical, technical knowledge and test design skills.
Excellent Excel skills essential. VBA scripting beneficial.
Experience of different testing techniques and tools
Experience in testing insurance documentation.
Experience of the software development project lifecycle.
Experience of JIRA and Zephyr desirable.
ISTQB foundation in software testing.
Exposure to Polaris productwriter software.
What will you get for this role?

A competitive market leading salary depending on skills, experience, and qualifications
Generous pension (employee contribution matching of up to 14% if you contribute 8%)
Annual performance related bonus and pay review.
Holiday allowance of 25 days plus bank holidays, and the option to buy/sell up to 5 additional days.
No weekend or evening shift.
Free car parking.
Generous Health & dental insurance contributions after six months.
Matching Share Plan and Save As You Earn scheme and Approved Profit Share Scheme.
Cycle to Work benefit scheme.
TaxSaver Travel Scheme.
Family friendly parent's (matching paternity and maternity leave) and carer's leave.
Up to 40% discount for some Insurance products plus discounts for Friends and Family.
Employee Assistance Programme.
Volunteering days.
Professional qualification support and transparent career progression plans.
A Company For Everyone

Their diversity and inclusion policies and initiatives are shaping an environment where everyone feels welcome regardless of age, disability, race, ethnicity, gender, gender identity, religion, culture, sexual orientation, national origin, marital status, pregnancy, maternity or those with other caring responsibilities. Their approach helps to ensure that their organisation is a place which values difference and provides equal opportunities for all.

They flex locations, hours and working patterns to suit their customers, business, and you.

Their smart working combines the benefits of flexibility with time together with colleagues.

description:
Functieomschrijving

Ben jij een data-analist? En heb jij affiniteit met de publieke gezondheid en infectiebestrijding? Lees dan snel verder!

Wat bieden wij jou

Beloning in gemeenteschaal 9 trede 4
Tijdelijk dienstverband met uitzicht op vast
Werken voor Gemeente Den Haag
Werken op Westeinde 128
32 tot 36 uur werken Wie ben jij

Je hebt een klant- en resultaatgerichte aanpak, waarbij je planmatig en organisatorisch te werk gaat. Met een grote dosis aan overtuigende, adviserende vaardigheden neem je het team, collega's en klanten mee in de uitkomsten van je analyses. Niet alleen het talent om data te analyseren en te vertalen naar bruikbare informatie is hierin essentieel, maar ook de beschikking over uitstekende communicatieve vaardigheden om de informatie over te brengen. Collega's typeren jou als een nauwkeurige, flexibele medewerker die oog heeft voor de mensen om zich heen. Het werk vraagt om een proactieve houding en grote mate van nauwkeurigheid.

Minimaal 2 jaar aantoonbare relevante werkervaring, bij voorkeur in de publieke gezondheid en infectieziekten in het bijzonder;
Ervaring met het beheren en controleren van data uit diverse administratieve processen;
Ervaring met het verbeteren van processen en het data gedreven werken stimuleren;
Ervaring met het begeleiden en vertalen van de informatiebehoefte;
Ervaring met data-analyse en visualisatie;
Gevorderde kennis van PowerBI;
Kennis van HPZone;
Beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal in woord en geschrift; Wat ga je doen

Je komt te werken binnen de afdeling Algemene Infectiebestrijding, maar werk je ook samen met collega's van andere afdelingen en de gemeente Den Haag. De afdeling maakt gebruik van diverse systemen, met daarin een veelvoud aan beschikbare data. Jij gaat met deze data aan de slag en weet dit om te zetten en te presenteren in begrijpelijke taal. Dit vraagt inzicht, een scherp analytisch vermogen en ruime ervaring. De data vertaal je naar dashboards en rapportages op basis van de behoefte van de afdeling die je hebt opgehaald. Ze dienen als input voor de surveillance en monitoring en zijn ondersteunend aan het beleid, financieel- en procesmanagement binnen de afdeling.

Je bent tevens een belangrijke adviseur op het gebied van de interne administratieve en algemene werkprocessen met als doel deze processen verder te optimaliseren. Waar nodig werk je nauw samen met onze softwareleveranciers, maar ook met andere samenwerkende organisaties. Daarnaast ben je verantwoordelijk voor een optimaal gebruik van BI tools (waaronder gebruikersondersteuning). Aan jou de uitdaging het datagericht werken binnen de afdeling naar een hoger niveau te brengen. Kortgezegd: Jij helpt onze organisatie om nog beter en efficiënter te kunnen opereren!

Waar ga je werken

Je gaat samenwerken met inhoudelijke experts, zoals artsen en verpleegkundigen. Daarnaast heb je veel contact met je collega data-analist en epidemiologen binnen de afdeling en ICT-specialisten van de Gemeente Den Haag. Het is een team dat volop in ontwikkeling is. Er is een open bedrijfscultuur, waarbij mensen graag de verbinding met elkaar opzoeken.

Sollicitatie

Kun jij je helemaal vinden in deze vacature? Solliciteer dan snel! Let op: zonder motivatiebrief nemen we je sollicitatie niet in behandeling.

Uiteraard staat deze vacature open voor iedereen die zich hierin herkent.

Sollicitatieprocedure

Je solliciteert via Tempo-Team, leuk! Om je sollicitatie af te ronden, maak je de eerste keer eenvoudig een account aan. Via je 'mijn Tempo-Team' account log je gemakkelijk in en solliciteer je de volgende keer nog eenvoudiger. Daarnaast vind je in je account de voortgang van je sollicitatie(s) en je persoonlijke gegevens. Dé manier dus om de best passende baan te vinden!

description:
What You Will Bring

We are looking for someone that has:

a good understanding and knowledge about the "laws of physics" in information technology, including an understanding of what is possible to accomplish in computer networks and systems, given different prerequisites.
experience with analysis of executable files and documents such as: PE files and/or JavaScript, Flash, Silverlight, PDF, Office documents, ELF and APK files.
experience with analysis of network traffic.
experience with or interest in technologies / software such as Snort, Suricata, Bro IDS (or other technologies for inspection and analysis of network traffic).
experience with or interest in technologies such as Yara (or other static malware analysis solutions).
experience with / interest in / desire to work with technologies such as Cuckoo, Joebox, Norman MAG, BlueCoat / Symantec MAA, FireEye AX, or experience with / interest in sandbox technologies. experience with / interest in / desire to work with software such as Volatility, Rekall (or memory analysis in general).
experience with / interest in / desire to work with software such as FTK, Encase, Sleuthkit, Log2timeline, Plaso (or traditional forensics in general).
experience with / interest in / desire to work with solutions such as Soltra, MISP or other platforms for information and data sharing. Relevant certifications

SANS Security certifications: SEC487, SEC503, SEC504, SEC505, SEC506, SEC511, SEC560, SEC599.
SANS Forensics certifications: FOR500, FOR508, FOR526, FOR572, FOR578, FOR610.

What We Can Offer

An informal and pleasant working environment that provides opportunities for growth, influence and variations in tasks
Competitive salary, share program and bonus scheme that promotes a long-term employment outlook, including attractive pension and insurance coverage
Opportunities for relevant professional training (courses) and conferences
We place a strong emphasis on workplace well-being and teambuilding through social activities, events and trips with colleagues. In addition, we have an inclusive environment that promotes work-life balance and accommodates to families. Both in Utrecht and Oslo our offices are centrally located. In Oslo, you'll find us at Solli plass.
A workplace that has been ranked as one of the best in Europe for a number of years. In Norway we have been amongst the top 10 workplaces for 10 years in a row. Last year, we even won our category!

How do I apply?

Email us at rekruttering-web@mnemonic.io and write "MSS-TI-Analyst" in the subject field. Add a text about why you are right for the job, and your CV. Send us a code project you have been working on, that illustrates exactly how you work with code.

If you have publications or projects you have worked on that you think represent your technical skills or ability to communicate, please attach or refer to these.

Background check

We use Semac AS for background checks in our recruitment process. Security clearance is a requirement.

Job Description

The Energy Data Analyst position supports the client interface with Kinect Energy, through multiple data platforms. Key responsibilities include data entry, processing and scanning of vendor invoices, data review and trend analysis. This position coordinates the communication and resolution of invoice discrepancies between the client, vendors, and Kinect Energy colleagues. This position requires ownership of various assigned supplemental activities that support the controls and processes needed for successful fulfillment of client requirements. You will be working in a fast paced, dynamic team-oriented environment.

Duties And Responsibilities

Ensure daily completion of all data entry processing of vendor invoices and usage data into Kinect Energy systems
Data review and needed resolution for all supply, pipeline and utility vendor invoices with assigned clients
Understand and be able to work within the Kinect Energy systems to produce client reports, as well as necessary back-up supporting documentation
Work within a data management team, distributing and contributing to the workload equally with team members
Effective use of current software and the willingness to be involved with beta testing, as needed
Communicate in a professional manner with verbal and written communications with all levels of employees, vendors, and clients
Coordinate with World Fuel Services personnel, suppliers, pipeline, and utilities to remedy errors discovered in a professional and timely manner
Quantify and report value to the Client Scorecard as incidents are remedied
An understanding of the energy contracts and complex energy invoices must be understood and analyzed
Requirements

Strong communication skills in English, both written and verbal are essential
Strong analytical skills are essential
Strong IT skills are essential in windows-based application software such as Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint
Experience of processing high volume of data in an educational or work environment is essential
Knowledge and/or experience in the energy industry is desirable
Strong problem-solving, mathematical, and organizational skills are essential
Strong team working skills are essential
Bachelor’s degree is desirable

description:
We are looking for a passionate, certified CX Data Analyst. The successful candidate will turn data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions.

The data analyst responsibilities include conducting full customer lifecycle analysis to identify pain points and opportunities to improve the overall customer experience.

The data analyst will set up and manage the corporate Voice of the Customer platform, develop analysis and reporting capabilities.

She/he will also monitor performance and quality control plans to identify improvements.

The main data sources to use will be Salesforce Sales & Service cloud, customer feedback tools, Product Usage analytics, …

Responsibilities

Collect data from Salesforce and other data sources and segment data for customer feedback gathering.
Manage the Voice of the Customer platform: set up and manage survey campaigns via several channels (e-mail, in-app, websites,).
Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets and determine the best way to represent it visually to managers and stakeholders by providing ongoing reports.
Monitor the integration with other systems & tools (Salesforce, Tableau,)
Filter and “clean” data by reviewing performance indicators to locate and correct customer data to ensure data quality.
Locate and define new process improvement opportunities.

Ensure quality assurance and process documentation.

Define Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), assess and determine the success of specific initiatives.

Work with management to prioritize business and information needs.
Develop and implement databases, data collection systems, data analytics and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality.
Acquire data from primary or secondary data sources and maintain databases/data systems.

Requirements And Skills

Proven working experience as a Data Analyst or Business Data Analyst
Technical expertise with Voice of the Customer platforms (Qualtrics, Customer Gauge, Forsta, Medallia,…) is an asset
Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy
Technical expertise regarding data models, database design development, data mining and segmentation techniques
Strong knowledge of and experience with reporting packages (Business Objects etc), databases (SQL etc), programming (XML, Javascript, or ETL frameworks)
Knowledge of statistics and experience using statistical packages for analyzing datasets (Excel, SPSS, SAS etc)
Adept at queries, report writing and presenting findings.
BS in Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, Information Management or Statistics

At Galderma we're unique and we embrace difference.

Whether it's the unique breadth of our integrated offering that covers Aesthetics, Consumer, and Prescription products; or our commitment to recognising and rewarding people for the contribution they make - working here isn't like anywhere else.

At Galderma, we actively give our teams reasons to believe in our ambition to become the leading dermatology company in the world. With us, you have the ultimate opportunity to gain new and challenging work experiences and create an unparalleled, direct impact.

Stellenbeschreibung
Der Business Intelligence Analyst (m/w/d) sammelt und analysiert Marktdaten im verantworteten Bereich, und unterstützt die Business Units bei der Ausarbeitung von Incentivierungs-Systemen und Strategieplänen. Diese Stelle ist in Elternzeitvertretung ab dem 01.08.2023 für 24 Monate befristet zu besetzen.

Hauptverantwortlichkeiten

Erstellt Datenberichte und unterstützt bei der Automatisierung dieser Berichte auf Basis der Geschäftsanforderungen
